Blocks.name: Armor Charger
description: This block works like a charging station for all
of your powerhungry devices. To power the block,
just hook up some RF to the bottom.

Blocks.name: Armor Table
description: This block is used to upgrade your armor.
You place your upgrade in the top slot
and your armor in the bottom slot
PS: Make sure the upgrade is suitable for the type
of armor.

Items.name: Energium Alloy Ingot
description: This special alloy, made by combining an Energy Core and
a block of obsidian, is used to craft the highest tier
of Custom Armor.

Items.name: Manual
description: This is the manual you are reading right now.

Items.name: Armor Upgrades
description: You can use upgrades to add extra features to your
armor. To apply an upgrade: See Armor Table.

Items.name: Custom Armor
description: This is a special kind of armor which you can upgrade
in the Armor Table. It comes in three tiers:
Iron, Diamond and Alloy

Items.name: Custom Sword
description: This is a special kind of sword which you can upgrade
in the Armor Table. It comes in three tiers:
Iron, Diamond and Alloy

Items.name: Energy Core
description: The Energy Core is used to craft all of the pieces of
armor, but it can also be used as a normal battery!
